      • load

        static void load(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState,
                 GameView gameView)
        Loads the state of teh game to a GameView. Change this method together with save.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - The bundle with the game state.
        gameView - The GameView that will load the state of the game.

      • ensureAppropriateState

        private static void ensureAppropriateState(GameView gameView)
        Step in the process of saving info to bundle, ensures that the end of eating and that the player has won or lost if that is teh case.
        Parameters:
        gameView - The GameView currently being played.

      • save

        static void save(android.os.Bundle outState,
                 GameView gameView)
        Sets the game information into a bundle. Change this method together with load.
        Parameters:
        outState - Bundle to save to.
        gameView - GameView that has the info being saved.
